thread.title: iPhone 6S available in SA on October 16
thread.title_full: iPhone 6S available in SA on October 16

title: iPhone 6S available in SA on October 16
text: iPhone 6S available in SA on October 16 October 5 2015 at 02:07pm By IOL Staff Comment on this story MTN today announced that it would be offering the new iPhone 6S and 6S Plus to its South African clients from Friday 16 October. This follows close on the heels of Vodacom which announced last week that it would be offering the Iphone 6S and 6S Plus from Friday 16 October. The new iPhone 6S was released in in the UK and US, among others, on September 25. For more on the iPhone 6S and 6S Plus: Please read our comment guidelines .
